Subject: Low disk space
Description:
Hi,
We get a message that the server has low disk space. I wanted to check how to clear out old logs without causing any issues. We could maybe enable "HDD Disk Space - Safety Logs Rotation. Click to enable Log Rotation" option in System Status.
Solution_Comment__c: The System Disk partition has about 20GB of space, around 7-10 GB(up to 50% of total disk size) are occupied by the "vital" components of the EPP server. If the Alert is set to trigger at 60% and display that message there, it will not affect the functionality of the EPP server. Most of the space that was cleared was related to alerts and journal entries.
